sqlMap.select:
SELECT '구분' AS GUBN_FLAG ,MAX(CASE NUM WHEN 1 THEN CUST_NAME END) AS FLAG_A1XX ,MAX(CASE NUM WHEN 2 THEN CUST_NAME END) AS FLAG_A2XX ,MAX(CASE NUM WHEN 3 THEN CUST_NAME END) AS FLAG_A3XX ,MAX(CASE NUM WHEN 4 THEN CUST_NAME END) AS FLAG_A4XX ,MAX(CASE NUM WHEN 5 THEN CUST_NAME END) AS FLAG_A5XX ,MAX(CASE NUM WHEN 6 THEN CUST_NAME END) AS FLAG_A6XX ,'합계' AS SUMM_FLAG FROM ( SELECT C.CUST_CODE, C.CUST_NAME, SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) DEND_AMTX, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) DESC) NUM FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON B.CUST_CODE = C.CUST_CODE WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY C.CUST_CODE, C.CUST_NAME )A UNION ALL SELECT '청구액' AS GUBN_FLAG ,CAST(SUM(CASE NUM WHEN 1 THEN DEND_AMTX END) AS NVARCHAR2(30)) AS FLAG_A1XX ,CAST(SUM(CASE NUM WHEN 2 THEN DEND_AMTX END) AS NVARCHAR2(30)) AS FLAG_A2XX ,CAST(SUM(CASE NUM WHEN 3 THEN DEND_AMTX END) AS NVARCHAR2(30)) AS FLAG_A3XX ,CAST(SUM(CASE NUM WHEN 4 THEN DEND_AMTX END) AS NVARCHAR2(30)) AS FLAG_A4XX ,CAST(SUM(CASE NUM WHEN 5 THEN DEND_AMTX END) AS NVARCHAR2(30)) AS FLAG_A5XX ,CAST(SUM(CASE NUM WHEN 6 THEN DEND_AMTX END) AS NVARCHAR2(30)) AS FLAG_A6XX ,CAST(SUM(DEND_AMTX) AS VARCHAR2(30)) AS SUMM_FLAG FROM ( SELECT C.CUST_CODE, C.CUST_NAME, SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) DEND_AMTX, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) DESC) NUM FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON B.CUST_CODE = C.CUST_CODE WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY C.CUST_CODE, C.CUST_NAME )A UNION ALL SELECT '정산액' AS GUBN_FLAG ,CAST(SUM(CASE NUM WHEN 1 THEN SUJU_AMTX END) AS NVARCHAR2(30)) AS FLAG_A1XX ,CAST(SUM(CASE NUM WHEN 2 THEN SUJU_AMTX END) AS NVARCHAR2(30)) AS FLAG_A2XX ,CAST(SUM(CASE NUM WHEN 3 THEN SUJU_AMTX END) AS NVARCHAR2(30)) AS FLAG_A3XX ,CAST(SUM(CASE NUM WHEN 4 THEN SUJU_AMTX END) AS NVARCHAR2(30)) AS FLAG_A4XX ,CAST(SUM(CASE NUM WHEN 5 THEN SUJU_AMTX END) AS NVARCHAR2(30)) AS FLAG_A5XX ,CAST(SUM(CASE NUM WHEN 6 THEN SUJU_AMTX END) AS NVARCHAR2(30)) AS FLAG_A6XX ,CAST(SUM(SUJU_AMTX) AS VARCHAR2(30)) AS SUMM_FLAG FROM ( SELECT C.CUST_CODE, C.CUST_NAME, SUM(A.SUJU_AMTX) SUJU_AMTX, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) DESC) NUM FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON B.CUST_CODE = C.CUST_CODE WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY C.CUST_CODE, C.CUST_NAME )A UNION ALL SELECT '내수액' AS GUBN_FLAG ,CAST(SUM(CASE NUM WHEN 1 THEN NESU_AMTX END) AS NVARCHAR2(30)) AS FLAG_A1XX ,CAST(SUM(CASE NUM WHEN 2 THEN NESU_AMTX END) AS NVARCHAR2(30)) AS FLAG_A2XX ,CAST(SUM(CASE NUM WHEN 3 THEN NESU_AMTX END) AS NVARCHAR2(30)) AS FLAG_A3XX ,CAST(SUM(CASE NUM WHEN 4 THEN NESU_AMTX END) AS NVARCHAR2(30)) AS FLAG_A4XX ,CAST(SUM(CASE NUM WHEN 5 THEN NESU_AMTX END) AS NVARCHAR2(30)) AS FLAG_A5XX ,CAST(SUM(CASE NUM WHEN 6 THEN NESU_AMTX END) AS NVARCHAR2(30)) AS FLAG_A6XX ,CAST(SUM(NESU_AMTX) AS VARCHAR2(30)) AS SUMM_FLAG FROM ( SELECT C.CUST_CODE, C.CUST_NAME, SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) - SUM(A.SUJU_AMTX) NESU_AMTX, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) DESC) NUM FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON B.CUST_CODE = C.CUST_CODE WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY C.CUST_CODE, C.CUST_NAME )A UNION ALL SELECT '내수율' AS GUBN_FLAG ,CAST(SUM(CASE NUM WHEN 1 THEN DEND_AMTX END) AS NVARCHAR2(30)) || '%' AS FLAG_A1XX ,CAST(SUM(CASE NUM WHEN 2 THEN DEND_AMTX END) AS NVARCHAR2(30)) || '%'AS FLAG_A2XX ,CAST(SUM(CASE NUM WHEN 3 THEN DEND_AMTX END) AS NVARCHAR2(30)) || '%'AS FLAG_A3XX ,CAST(SUM(CASE NUM WHEN 4 THEN DEND_AMTX END) AS NVARCHAR2(30)) || '%'AS FLAG_A4XX ,CAST(SUM(CASE NUM WHEN 5 THEN DEND_AMTX END) AS NVARCHAR2(30)) || '%'AS FLAG_A5XX ,CAST(SUM(CASE NUM WHEN 6 THEN DEND_AMTX END) AS NVARCHAR2(30)) || '%'AS FLAG_A6XX ,ROUND((SUM(DEND_SUMM) - SUM(SUJU_SUMM))/ SUM(DEND_SUMM) * 100,1) || '%'AS SUMM_FLAG FROM ( SELECT C.CUST_CODE, C.CUST_NAME, CASE MAX(NVL(D.AGCY_YSNO,'N')) WHEN 'Y' THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(((SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) - SUM(A.SUJU_AMTX))/SUM(A.DEND_AMTX)) * 100,1) END AS DEND_AMTX, CASE MAX(NVL(D.AGCY_YSNO,'N')) WHEN 'Y' THEN 0 ELSE SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) END AS DEND_SUMM, CASE MAX(NVL(D.AGCY_YSNO,'N')) WHEN 'Y' THEN 0 ELSE SUM(A.SUJU_AMTX) END AS SUJU_SUMM, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) DESC) NUM , MAX(NVL(D.AGCY_YSNO,'N')) AS AGCY_YSNO FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON B.CUST_CODE = C.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN PD_CLASXM D ON A.OUTS_CODE = D.CUST_CODE WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY C.CUST_CODE, C.CUST_NAME )A UNION ALL SELECT '모델료' AS GUBN_FLAG ,CAST(SUM(CASE NUM WHEN 1 THEN DEND_AMTX END) AS NVARCHAR2(30)) AS FLAG_A1XX ,CAST(SUM(CASE NUM WHEN 2 THEN DEND_AMTX END) AS NVARCHAR2(30)) AS FLAG_A2XX ,CAST(SUM(CASE NUM WHEN 3 THEN DEND_AMTX END) AS NVARCHAR2(30)) AS FLAG_A3XX ,CAST(SUM(CASE NUM WHEN 4 THEN DEND_AMTX END) AS NVARCHAR2(30)) AS FLAG_A4XX ,CAST(SUM(CASE NUM WHEN 5 THEN DEND_AMTX END) AS NVARCHAR2(30)) AS FLAG_A5XX ,CAST(SUM(CASE NUM WHEN 6 THEN DEND_AMTX END) AS NVARCHAR2(30)) AS FLAG_A6XX ,CAST(SUM(DEND_AMTX) AS VARCHAR2(30)) AS SUMM_FLAG FROM ( SELECT C.CUST_CODE, C.CUST_NAME, CASE NVL(D.AGCY_YSNO,'N') WHEN 'Y'THEN SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) END AS DEND_AMTX, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) DESC) NUM ,D.AGCY_YSNO FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON B.CUST_CODE = C.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN PD_CLASXM D ON A.OUTS_CODE = D.CUST_CODE WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY C.CUST_CODE, C.CUST_NAME, D.AGCY_YSNO )A

SELECT '청구액' AS GUBN_FLAG , NVL(SUM(A1),0) AS TOTL_CONT1 , NVL(SUM(A2),0) AS TOTL_CONT2 , NVL(SUM(A1),0) + NVL(SUM(A2),0) SUMM_CONT FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN C.RETY_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) END A1 ,CASE WHEN C.RETY_CODE IS NULL THEN SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) END A2 ,C.RETY_CODE FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON B.CUST_CODE = C.CUST_CODE WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY C.RETY_CODE )A UNION ALL SELECT '정산액' AS GUBN_FLAG , NVL(SUM(A1),0) AS TOTL_CONT1 , NVL(SUM(A2),0) AS TOTL_CONT2 , NVL(SUM(A1),0) + NVL(SUM(A2),0) SUMM_CONT FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN C.RETY_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN SUM(A.SUJU_AMTX) END A1 ,CASE WHEN C.RETY_CODE IS NULL THEN SUM(A.SUJU_AMTX) END A2 ,C.RETY_CODE FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON B.CUST_CODE = C.CUST_CODE WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY C.RETY_CODE )A UNION ALL SELECT '내수액' AS GUBN_FLAG , NVL(SUM(A1),0) AS TOTL_CONT1 , NVL(SUM(A2),0) AS TOTL_CONT2 , NVL(SUM(A1),0) + NVL(SUM(A2),0) SUMM_CONT FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN C.RETY_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) - SUM(A.SUJU_AMTX) END A1 ,CASE WHEN C.RETY_CODE IS NULL THEN SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) - SUM(A.SUJU_AMTX) END A2 ,C.RETY_CODE FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON B.CUST_CODE = C.CUST_CODE WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY C.RETY_CODE )A UNION ALL SELECT '내수율' AS GUBN_FLAG , ROUND(SUM(A1),1) AS TOTL_CONT1 , ROUND(SUM(A2),1) AS TOTL_CONT2 , ROUND(((SUM(DEND_AMTX) - SUM(SUJU_AMTX))/SUM(DEND_AMTX)) * 100,1) AS SUMM_CONT FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN C.RETY_CODE = 1 THEN ((SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) - SUM(A.SUJU_AMTX))/SUM(A.DEND_AMTX)) * 100 END A1 ,CASE WHEN C.RETY_CODE = 0 THEN ((SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) - SUM(A.SUJU_AMTX))/SUM(A.DEND_AMTX)) * 100 END A2 ,SUM(DEND_AMTX) AS DEND_AMTX ,SUM(SUJU_AMTX) AS SUJU_AMTX ,C.RETY_CODE FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CASE WHEN RETY_CODE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END RETY_CODE ,CUST_CODE FROM TA_CUSTXM GROUP BY CUST_CODE, CASE WHEN RETY_CODE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END )C ON B.CUST_CODE = C.CUST_CODE WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY C.RETY_CODE )A UNION ALL SELECT '모델료' AS GUBN_FLAG , NVL(SUM(A1),0) AS TOTL_CONT1 , NVL(SUM(A2),0) AS TOTL_CONT2 , NVL(SUM(A1),0) + NVL(SUM(A2),0) SUMM_CONT FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN C.RETY_CODE = 1 THEN CASE NVL(D.AGCY_YSNO,'N') WHEN 'Y'THEN SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) END END A1 ,CASE WHEN C.RETY_CODE = 0 THEN CASE NVL(D.AGCY_YSNO,'N') WHEN 'Y'THEN SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) END END A2 ,C.RETY_CODE , D.AGCY_YSNO FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CASE WHEN RETY_CODE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END RETY_CODE ,CUST_CODE FROM TA_CUSTXM GROUP BY CUST_CODE, CASE WHEN RETY_CODE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END )C ON B.CUST_CODE = C.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN PD_CLASXM D ON A.OUTS_CODE = D.CUST_CODE WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY C.RETY_CODE, D.AGCY_YSNO )A

SELECT '청구액' AS GUBN_FLAG , NVL(SUM(A1),0) AS TOTL_CONT1 , NVL(SUM(A2),0) AS TOTL_CONT2 , NVL(SUM(A1),0) + NVL(SUM(A2),0) SUMM_CONT FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN C.RETY_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) END A1 ,CASE WHEN C.RETY_CODE IS NULL THEN SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) END A2 ,C.RETY_CODE FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON B.CUST_CODE = C.CUST_CODE WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY C.RETY_CODE )A UNION ALL SELECT '정산액' AS GUBN_FLAG , NVL(SUM(A1),0) AS TOTL_CONT1 , NVL(SUM(A2),0) AS TOTL_CONT2 , NVL(SUM(A1),0) + NVL(SUM(A2),0) SUMM_CONT FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN C.RETY_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN SUM(A.SUJU_AMTX) END A1 ,CASE WHEN C.RETY_CODE IS NULL THEN SUM(A.SUJU_AMTX) END A2 ,C.RETY_CODE FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON B.CUST_CODE = C.CUST_CODE WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY C.RETY_CODE )A UNION ALL SELECT '내수액' AS GUBN_FLAG , NVL(SUM(A1),0) AS TOTL_CONT1 , NVL(SUM(A2),0) AS TOTL_CONT2 , NVL(SUM(A1),0) + NVL(SUM(A2),0) SUMM_CONT FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN C.RETY_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) - SUM(A.SUJU_AMTX) END A1 ,CASE WHEN C.RETY_CODE IS NULL THEN SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) - SUM(A.SUJU_AMTX) END A2 ,C.RETY_CODE FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON B.CUST_CODE = C.CUST_CODE WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY C.RETY_CODE )A UNION ALL SELECT '내수율' AS GUBN_FLAG , ROUND(SUM(A1),1) AS TOTL_CONT1 , ROUND(SUM(A2),1) AS TOTL_CONT2 , ROUND(((SUM(DEND_AMTX) - SUM(SUJU_AMTX))/SUM(DEND_AMTX)) * 100,1) AS SUMM_CONT FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN C.RETY_CODE = 1 THEN ((SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) - SUM(A.SUJU_AMTX))/SUM(A.DEND_AMTX)) * 100 END A1 ,CASE WHEN C.RETY_CODE = 0 THEN ((SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) - SUM(A.SUJU_AMTX))/SUM(A.DEND_AMTX)) * 100 END A2 ,SUM(DEND_AMTX) AS DEND_AMTX ,SUM(SUJU_AMTX) AS SUJU_AMTX ,C.RETY_CODE FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CASE WHEN RETY_CODE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END RETY_CODE ,CUST_CODE FROM TA_CUSTXM GROUP BY CUST_CODE, CASE WHEN RETY_CODE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END )C ON B.CUST_CODE = C.CUST_CODE WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY C.RETY_CODE )A UNION ALL SELECT '모델료' AS GUBN_FLAG , NVL(SUM(A1),0) AS TOTL_CONT1 , NVL(SUM(A2),0) AS TOTL_CONT2 , NVL(SUM(A1),0) + NVL(SUM(A2),0) SUMM_CONT FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN C.RETY_CODE = 1 THEN CASE NVL(D.AGCY_YSNO,'N') WHEN 'Y'THEN SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) END END A1 ,CASE WHEN C.RETY_CODE = 0 THEN CASE NVL(D.AGCY_YSNO,'N') WHEN 'Y'THEN SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) END END A2 ,C.RETY_CODE , D.AGCY_YSNO FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CASE WHEN RETY_CODE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END RETY_CODE ,CUST_CODE FROM TA_CUSTXM GROUP BY CUST_CODE, CASE WHEN RETY_CODE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END )C ON B.CUST_CODE = C.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN PD_CLASXM D ON A.OUTS_CODE = D.CUST_CODE WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY C.RETY_CODE, D.AGCY_YSNO )A

SELECT HOME_SUMM , CASE WHEN HOME_AMTB =0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((HOME_SUMM / HOME_AMTB) * 100 ,1) END AS HOME_RATE ,OUTS_SUMM , CASE WHEN OUTS_AMTB =0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((OUTS_SUMM / OUTS_AMTB) * 100 ,1) END AS OUTS_RATE , HOME_SUMM + OUTS_SUMM AS SUMM_SUMM , CASE WHEN (HOME_AMTX + OUTS_AMTX) =0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((HOME_SUMM + OUTS_SUMM) / (HOME_AMTX + OUTS_AMTX) * 100,1) END AS SUMM_RATE FROM ( SELECT '청구액' , NVL(SUM(A1),0) AS HOME_AMTX , NVL(SUM(A3),0) AS HOME_AMTB , NVL(SUM(A2),0) AS OUTS_AMTX , NVL(SUM(A4),0) AS OUTS_AMTB ,NVL(SUM(A1),0) - NVL(SUM(A3),0) AS HOME_SUMM ,NVL(SUM(A2),0) - NVL(SUM(A4),0) AS OUTS_SUMM FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN C.RETY_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) END A1 ,CASE WHEN C.RETY_CODE IS NULL THEN SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) END A2 ,0 AS A3 ,0 AS A4 ,C.RETY_CODE FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON B.CUST_CODE = C.CUST_CODE WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY C.RETY_CODE UNION ALL SELECT 0 AS A1 ,0 AS A2 ,CASE WHEN C.RETY_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) END AS A3 ,CASE WHEN C.RETY_CODE IS NULL THEN SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) END AS A4 ,C.RETY_CODE FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON B.CUST_CODE = C.CUST_CODE WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY C.RETY_CODE )A )A UNION ALL SELECT HOME_SUMM ,CASE WHEN HOME_AMTB =0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((HOME_SUMM / HOME_AMTB) * 100 ,1) END AS HOME_RATE ,OUTS_SUMM ,CASE WHEN OUTS_AMTB =0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((OUTS_SUMM / OUTS_AMTB) * 100 ,1) END AS OUTS_RATE , HOME_SUMM + OUTS_SUMM AS SUMM_SUMM ,CASE WHEN (HOME_AMTX + OUTS_AMTX) =0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((HOME_SUMM + OUTS_SUMM) / (HOME_AMTX + OUTS_AMTX) * 100,1) END AS SUMM_RATE FROM ( SELECT '정산액' , NVL(SUM(A1),0) AS HOME_AMTX , NVL(SUM(A3),0) AS HOME_AMTB , NVL(SUM(A2),0) AS OUTS_AMTX , NVL(SUM(A4),0) AS OUTS_AMTB ,NVL(SUM(A1),0) - NVL(SUM(A3),0) AS HOME_SUMM ,NVL(SUM(A2),0) - NVL(SUM(A4),0) AS OUTS_SUMM FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN C.RETY_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN SUM(A.SUJU_AMTX) END A1 ,CASE WHEN C.RETY_CODE IS NULL THEN SUM(A.SUJU_AMTX) END A2 ,0 AS A3 ,0 AS A4 ,C.RETY_CODE FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON B.CUST_CODE = C.CUST_CODE WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY C.RETY_CODE UNION ALL SELECT 0 AS A1 ,0 AS A2 ,CASE WHEN C.RETY_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN SUM(A.SUJU_AMTX) END AS A3 ,CASE WHEN C.RETY_CODE IS NULL THEN SUM(A.SUJU_AMTX) END AS A4 ,C.RETY_CODE FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON B.CUST_CODE = C.CUST_CODE WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY C.RETY_CODE )A )A UNION ALL SELECT HOME_SUMM , CASE WHEN HOME_AMTB = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((HOME_SUMM / HOME_AMTB) * 100 ,1) END AS HOME_RATE ,OUTS_SUMM , CASE WHEN OUTS_AMTB = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((OUTS_SUMM / OUTS_AMTB) * 100 ,1) END AS OUTS_RATE , HOME_SUMM + OUTS_SUMM AS SUMM_SUMM , CASE WHEN (HOME_AMTX + OUTS_AMTX) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((HOME_SUMM + OUTS_SUMM) / (HOME_AMTX + OUTS_AMTX) * 100,1) END AS SUMM_RATE FROM ( SELECT '내수액' , NVL(SUM(A1),0) AS HOME_AMTX , NVL(SUM(A3),0) AS HOME_AMTB , NVL(SUM(A2),0) AS OUTS_AMTX , NVL(SUM(A4),0) AS OUTS_AMTB ,NVL(SUM(A1),0) - NVL(SUM(A3),0) AS HOME_SUMM ,NVL(SUM(A2),0) - NVL(SUM(A4),0) AS OUTS_SUMM FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN C.RETY_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) - SUM(A.SUJU_AMTX) END A1 ,CASE WHEN C.RETY_CODE IS NULL THEN SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) - SUM(A.SUJU_AMTX) END A2 ,0 AS A3 ,0 AS A4 ,C.RETY_CODE FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON B.CUST_CODE = C.CUST_CODE WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY C.RETY_CODE UNION ALL SELECT 0 AS A1 ,0 AS A2 ,CASE WHEN C.RETY_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) - SUM(A.SUJU_AMTX) END AS A3 ,CASE WHEN C.RETY_CODE IS NULL THEN SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) - SUM(A.SUJU_AMTX) END AS A4 ,C.RETY_CODE FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON B.CUST_CODE = C.CUST_CODE WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY C.RETY_CODE )A )A UNION ALL SELECT 0 AS HOME_AMTX , 0 AS HOME_AMTB , 0 AS OUTS_AMTX , 0 AS OUTS_AMTB , 0 AS HOME_SUMM , 0 AS OUTS_SUMM FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT HOME_SUMM ,CASE WHEN HOME_AMTB = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((HOME_SUMM / HOME_AMTB) * 100 ,1) END AS HOME_RATE ,OUTS_SUMM ,CASE WHEN OUTS_AMTB = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((OUTS_SUMM / OUTS_AMTB) * 100 ,1) END AS OUTS_RATE , HOME_SUMM + OUTS_SUMM AS SUMM_SUMM ,CASE WHEN (HOME_AMTX + OUTS_AMTX) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((HOME_SUMM + OUTS_SUMM) / (HOME_AMTX + OUTS_AMTX) * 100,1) END AS SUMM_RATE FROM ( SELECT '모델료' , NVL(SUM(A1),0) AS HOME_AMTX , NVL(SUM(A3),0) AS HOME_AMTB , NVL(SUM(A2),0) AS OUTS_AMTX , NVL(SUM(A4),0) AS OUTS_AMTB ,NVL(SUM(A1),0) - NVL(SUM(A3),0) AS HOME_SUMM ,NVL(SUM(A2),0) - NVL(SUM(A4),0) AS OUTS_SUMM FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN C.RETY_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN CASE NVL(D.AGCY_YSNO,'N') WHEN 'Y'THEN SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) END END AS A1 ,CASE WHEN C.RETY_CODE IS NULL THEN CASE NVL(D.AGCY_YSNO,'N') WHEN 'Y'THEN SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) END END AS A2 ,0 AS A3 ,0 AS A4 ,C.RETY_CODE FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON B.CUST_CODE = C.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN PD_CLASXM D ON A.OUTS_CODE = D.CUST_CODE WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY C.RETY_CODE , D.AGCY_YSNO UNION ALL SELECT 0 AS A1 ,0 AS A2 ,CASE WHEN C.RETY_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN CASE NVL(D.AGCY_YSNO,'N') WHEN 'Y'THEN SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) END END AS A3 ,CASE WHEN C.RETY_CODE IS NULL THEN CASE NVL(D.AGCY_YSNO,'N') WHEN 'Y'THEN SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) END END AS A4 ,C.RETY_CODE FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON B.CUST_CODE = C.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN PD_CLASXM D ON A.OUTS_CODE = D.CUST_CODE WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY C.RETY_CODE , D.AGCY_YSNO )A )A

SELECT A.JOBN_NUMB , B.JOBN_NAME , B.MEDA_CODE , SF_GET_CLASNAME(B.MEDA_CODE) AS MEDA_NAME , TO_NUMBER(SUM(ESTI_AMTX)) AS ESTI_AMTX , TO_NUMBER(SUM(DEND_AMTX)) AS DEND_AMTX , TO_NUMBER(SUM(SUJU_AMTX)) AS SUJU_AMTX FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB WHERE 1=1
SUBSTR(B.DEND_DATE,0,6) BETWEEN #YEAR_MONT1# AND '999999'
SUBSTR(B.DEND_DATE,0,6) BETWEEN '000000' AND #YEAR_MONT2#
B.MEDA_CODE = #MEDA_CODE#
B.CUST_CODE = #CUST_CODE#
SUBSTR(B.DEND_DATE,1,6) = #YEARMON#
GROUP BY A.JOBN_NUMB , B.JOBN_NAME , B.MEDA_CODE

SELECT A.JOBN_NUMB , B.JOBN_NAME , B.MEDA_CODE , SF_GET_CLASNAME(B.MEDA_CODE) AS MEDA_NAME , TO_NUMBER(SUM(ESTI_AMTX)) AS ESTI_AMTX , TO_NUMBER(SUM(DEND_AMTX)) AS DEND_AMTX , TO_NUMBER(SUM(SUJU_AMTX)) AS SUJU_AMTX FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB WHERE 1=1
SUBSTR(B.DEND_DATE,0,6) BETWEEN #YEAR_MONT1# AND '999999'
SUBSTR(B.DEND_DATE,0,6) BETWEEN '000000' AND #YEAR_MONT2#
B.MEDA_CODE = #MEDA_CODE#
B.PLAN_DEPT = #PLAN_DEPT#
B.PROD_DEPT = #PROD_DEPT#
GROUP BY A.JOBN_NUMB , B.JOBN_NAME , B.MEDA_CODE

SELECT CASE WHEN C.CUTY_CODE = 'TS100010' THEN '계열' ELSE '비계열' END AS CUTY_NAME , B.MEDA_CODE , SF_GET_CLASNAME(B.MEDA_CODE) AS MEDA_NAME , B.JOBN_NUMB , B.JOBN_NAME , TO_NUMBER(SUM(ESTI_AMTX)) AS ESTI_AMTX , TO_NUMBER(SUM(DEND_AMTX)) AS DEND_AMTX , TO_NUMBER(SUM(SUJU_AMTX)) AS SUJU_AMTX FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON B.CUST_CODE = C.CUST_CODE WHERE 1=1
SUBSTR(B.DEND_DATE,0,6) BETWEEN #YEAR_MONT1# AND '999999'
SUBSTR(B.DEND_DATE,0,6) BETWEEN '000000' AND #YEAR_MONT2#
B.MEDA_CODE = #MEDA_CODE#
C.CUTY_CODE = #CUTY_CODE#
GROUP BY B.JOBN_NUMB, C.CUTY_CODE, B.MEDA_CODE,B.JOBN_NAME
